src:
Aleksandar Mitrović najbolji igrač Čempionšipa
Za mesec oktobar

06 Nov 2019

Dileme skoro nije ni bilo! Srpski reprezentativac Aleksandar Mitrović proglašen je za najboljeg igrača u Čempionšipu za oktobar. Napadač Fulama imao je briljatna izdanja u poslednjih pet sedmica.
Tokom oktobra postigao je šest golova. Upečatljiv utisak ostavio je na meču protiv Lutona, kada je het-trikom Kolibarima doneo trijumf (3:2). Pogađao je mrežu Čarltona, dok je dva puta bio precizan u sudaru sa Lutonom. Od početka sezone Mitrović je postigao 11 golova.
On je dobio 46 posto glasova navijača širom sveta. Daleko ispod Mitrovića ostao je golman Lids Junajteda Kiko Kasilja sa 18 posto glasova.
text:
Aleksandar Mitrovic is the best player of the Championship
For the month of October

06 Nov 2019

The dilemma was almost gone! Serbian national team player Aleksandar Mitrovic was named best player in the Championship for October. The Fulham striker has had brilliant releases in the last five weeks.
He scored six goals in October. He made a striking impression in the match against Luton, when he scored a triumph (3: 2) with the hummingbird Kolibari. He hit Charlton's net while scoring twice in a collision with Luton. Mitrovic has scored 11 goals since the start of the season.
He received 46 percent of the vote worldwide. Far below Mitrovic remained Leads United goalkeeper Kiko Kassil with 18 percent of the vote.
